title: HTTP
body: I cant connect to something called HTTP Server every time i click the logo it goes away and then it show me a notification and it says ¨Couldn't connect to the HTTP severs¨ What do i do pleas help?

replies.body: I think the error might be misleading for your specific issue.   When you select the logo, the patcher needs to load up, which requires permission from your OS.  As a first step, I suggest going over the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that your PC is allowing the patcher to launch.  Let me know how that works for you!
